title: 57. Ways Our Ego Tells Us Lies About Ourselves
description:
Hey girl!
 
In this episode, we talk about some of the ways our ego tells us lies about who we are. We discuss how some of these lies develop from our childhood. Often times, we feel as though we are broken, as though something is inherently wrong with us, and as though nothing good will ever come our way. We think these lies are our truth when in reality, they are actually lies that come from our ego.
Please don't forget to rate & review!
 
Click here to join the no more codependent thought patterns masterclass!
 
(or visit beatricekamau.com/programs)
